job_title: Systems Analyst (Tactical Networks – CANES) | Active Secret clearance
job_description:
• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
• For more information about GDIT's Privacy Policy, click here: https://www.
• Com/privacy-policy/notices/.

• Experience with a cloud environment and services (e.
• A background in biology is not required, but curiosity and scientific interest is.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline and 2 years of software development OR 4 years of professional experience building software.
• Experience developing web applications in React and Redux.
• Experience with shipping and maintaining software.
• Strong understanding of computer science fundamentals (e.
• Data structures, space and time complexity) Deep understanding of testing, build, continuous integration, deployment & continuous monitoring.
• AWS) Willingness to solve problems irrespective of where it is in the tech stack.
